content: p on rs k on ws t2l work these 2 rounds 5 7 4 5 6 more times 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 then work round 1 only 0 0 5 6 7 more times 24 sts remain knit to end of needle 1 worked in the round worked back and forth in row round 1 * k2 p1 t2r t2l p1 repeat from * row 1 rs * k2 p1 t2r t2l p1 repeat finishing to end of round from * to end graft toe stitches together using kitchener rounds 2 4 * k2 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * row 2 and 4 ws * k1 p4 k1 p2 repeat stitch to end of round from * to end weave in ends repeat these 4 rounds for pattern row 3 * k2 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * to end enjoy your new socks repeat these 4 row for pattern judy lives in the pacific northwest when she s not busy chasing around a preschooler she spends her time knitting and rescuing dogs you can see more of judy s designs on ravelry username judyka © 2011 twistcollective com judy kaethler photography jane heller all rights reserved for personal use only v03 25 11
